other_tests.findings: Extensive acellular eosinophilic material staining strongly positive with Congo red, consistent with amyloidosis, affecting glomeruli, vessels, and medulla; moderate tubular atrophy, interstitial fibrosis, and arteriolosclerosis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Serum creatinine gradually increased to 2.8 mg/dl 2 months later, prompting the kidney biopsy. After the biopsy, serum creatinine level was 2.3 mg/dl.

other_tests.findings: Detected amyloid in the gastric, duodenal, and rectal mucosa.
Moderate to severe concentric increase in left ventricular wall thickness; reduced global average peak systolic strain.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The patient had a mildly elevated troponin T level (0.12 ng/ml) and elevated NT-proBNP (4890 pg/ml) five months post-renal biopsy.

other_tests.findings: Sinus rhythm, normal voltage QRS complexes, t-wave inversion in leads I and aVL, mild biphasic t waves in leads V5 and V6.
